original_text: This was the list of the clans of the sons of Gershon, all who served in the tent of meeting, whom Moses and Aaron listed according to the commandment of the Lord.
korean_text: 이는 모세와 아론이 여호와의 명령대로 회막에서 종사하는 게르손 자손의 모든 종족 중 계수된 자니라

sentences.original_text: This was the list of the clans of the sons of Gershon
all who served in the tent of meeting
according to the commandment of the Lord
